column5: Hi everybody, I've been a lurker on the board for a while so I thought It was about time I should register an account.I love fishing or all species but carp are probably my favourite. I usually float fish if the conditions allow it and I'm interested in European and Asian fishing techniques. I picked the name "Float Buddha" because I spend a lot of time meditating on my float, not because of my "robust" physique.  The above pic is from yesterdays session at one of my local spots. I don't know what's up but this year it's producing much better quality perch than I've seen in years.
Hey welcome aboard Buddha! Starting with fish pics is NEVER a bad idea!! Good job!
Welcome aboard FB, I'm a bit of a float guy myself.
Welcome to the best fishing forum. Lots of great people here and some of the most knowledgeable fisherman I have met.
Good to see ya FB !! ummmmmm Perch !!!
welcome...  feel free to ask questions...there are some good carp anglers here that fish different styles... youll get lots of good answers to most questions...
Great name welcome to the board. I fish for big Catfish mostly and the time I have spent staring and mentally projecting the image of the time going down is shameful.  Art
Welcome to the board,maybe carp fishing is my calling lol, Lots of good help here ,enjoy.
Welcome aboard. Looking forward to your input.
Welcome. Hope you share some stories with us.
Welcome to OFC  -  this is a great place to be!  That is one quality Perch!  Cheers, Ryan
Welcome FB, nice lookin purchasing agent
Welcome! Nice perch. If you can post picture/reports. Was the backbone of board before.
